parameters.name: AdditionalAttributes
parameters.description: This parameter is not publicly available.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The number of entries per page.

Valid values: 1 to 100.

Default value: 10.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the snapshot-consistent group.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that determines the start point of the next query. Set the value to the NextToken value that is returned from the last call.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the snapshot-consistent group. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the snapshot-consistent group belongs.

parameters.name: SnapshotGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of snapshot-consistent group N. Valid values of N: 1 to 10.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The state of snapshot-consistent group N. Valid values of the second N: 1, 2, and 3. Valid values:

*   progressing: The snapshot-consistent group is being created.
*   accomplished: The snapshot-consistent group is created.
*   failed: The snapshot-consistent group fails to be created.

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags of the snapshot-consistent group.
